title: Bug 37021 - Incorrect Source Path in Declare Warning on Binary Files
description: When targeting .class files from injars in declare warning messages, the source path is displayed incorrectly as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. This issue was observed while working with AJDT and may result in false positives during error detection due to the absence of filename checking in harness verification of messages.
OB: The source path in declare warning messages for .class files is displayed as 'app.Main.class'.
EB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the source path should be listed as 'app/Main' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run the code from 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/'
2. Observe the declare warning messages related to .class files in injars.
